entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -13.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
